title: Eliminate mocked inference from production code

milestone.title: v0.1.0-mvp
milestone.description: MVP release with CPU baseline and honest compute

body:
## Problem

Current codebase contains mocked inference paths that bypass real kernel execution. This violates honest compute principles and makes performance claims unverifiable.

## Solution

1. Generate CPU baseline receipt with real kernel IDs
2. Implement receipt verification in CI (Model Gates workflow)
3. Remove all mocked inference code paths
4. Update documentation with receipt-verified performance

## Acceptance Criteria

- [x] CPU baseline generated with I2_S quantization
- [x] Receipt schema v1.0.0 implemented
- [x] Model Gates (CPU) workflow operational
- [x] All mocked inference removed from production
- [x] Documentation updated with receipt evidence

## Resolution

Fixed in PR #435. CPU baseline established at docs/baselines/20251009-cpu.json with measured 15.3 tok/s performance.
